text:
If the test starts, you can see the acutall test status in the "View Results 
Tree". this means you can see the testresults flowing in. If you go into 
the "View Results in Table" you see only the actuall state, but the test are 
not flowing in the Table.
creator: jochen.stiepel@dresdner-bank.com
jochen.stiepel@dresdner-bank.com
text:
If you already stay in the View Results in Table and starts than the test, it 
updates the View slow but it updates. (JDK 1.4.1-rc; WinNT4;CVS_latest)

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
